targets.query:
from(bucket: "__TEMP_BUCKET__")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "selfmade-solar-data" and
    r._field == "ChargeWatt" and
    r.system == "__TEMP_ID__"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Production" }))

from(bucket: "__TEMP_BUCKET__")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "selfmade-solar-data" and
    r._field == "TotalConsumption" and
    r.system == "__TEMP_ID__"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Consumption" }))

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)

  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Voltage" }))

from(bucket: "__TEMP_BUCKET__")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "selfmade-solar-data" and
    r._field == "ConsumptionInverterAmpere" and
    r.system == "__TEMP_ID__"
  )

from(bucket: "__TEMP_BUCKET__")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "selfmade-solar-data" and
    r._field == "ConsumptionInverterWatt" and
    r.system == "__TEMP_ID__"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Watt" }))

from(bucket: "__TEMP_BUCKET__")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "selfmade-solar-data" and
    r._field == "TotalConsumption" and
    r.system == "__TEMP_ID__"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Consumption" }))

from(bucket: "__TEMP_BUCKET__")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "selfmade-solar-data" and
    (r._field == "TotalConsumption" or r._field == "Duration") and
    r.system == "__TEMP_ID__"
  )
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value" )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.TotalConsumption * r.Duration / 3600.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum)

from(bucket: "__TEMP_BUCKET__")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "selfmade-solar-data" and
    (r._field == "TotalConsumption" or r._field == "Duration") and
    r.system == "__TEMP_ID__"
  )
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value" )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.TotalConsumption * r.Duration / 3600.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum)

from(bucket: "__TEMP_BUCKET__")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "selfmade-solar-data" and
    (r._field == "TotalConsumption" or r._field == "ChargeWatt" or r._field == "Duration") and
    r.system == "__TEMP_ID__"
  )
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value" )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r.ChargeWatt - r.TotalConsumption) * r.Duration / 3600.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum)
